data.text:
2021-22 Men's Track and Field Roster

Choose a Player:

Greg Carroccio/Sideline Photos

Eric Ford

Position Sprints

Class Sophomore

Hometown Fort Washington, PA

High School La Salle College High

Bio

Related

Historical

Biography

Tfrrs Page

Career Bests

60m- 7.38

100m-11.21

200m- 22.16

400m- 49.43

On Hawk Hill: Made his collegiate debut at the Temple Invitational in the 200m and 400m… set two career bests in the 100m (11.21) and the 200m (22.16) at the 2021 Atlantic 10 Outdoor Track and Field Championships…competed in the 200m (15th) and the 4x400m relay (6th) at the IC4A Outdoor Track and Field Championships… was the third leg of the 4x400m relay that placed third to medal at the Atlantic 10 Indoor Track and Field Championships.. Also competed in the 200m and 400m… ran the second leg of the 4x400m relay that took gold at the 2022 IC4A Indoor Track and Field Championships… ran on the 4x100m relay and the 4x400m relay that placed second in the college final at Penn Relays… competed in the 400, 4x100m and 4x400m relays at the 2022 Atlantic 10 outdoor Track and Field Championships earning a silver medal with the 4x400m relay.

High School/Personal: 2019-20 Philadelphia Catholic League 60m champion... PCL All-Conference in the 60m, 200m, and 400m... PTFCA 400m podium finish... Senior PRs included 60m (7.24), 200m (22.39), and 400m (49.77)... Earned eight varsity letters between indoor and outdoor track... Also earned three varsity letters in ice hockey and one in football... 2019 state champion and Flyers Cup champion for ice hockey... Double majoring in accounting and business intelligence and analytics.
